name: The Pyramid Of Bones (itch)
description:
In our game The Pyramid of Bones you will have to kill as many mummies as you can, when feeling overwhelmed you can always extract through a door and keep your score. Items spawn all around the map so to survive longer and to get better weapons it's best that you move around the map. Become the best mummy slayer out there and try to top everybody's high score!

The Pyramid of Bones can be played in single-player or multi-player! So you are able to slaughter a bunch of mummies with up to 3 of your friends!

We highly recommend that you play the tutorial before becoming a mummy slayer so you won't miss out on any of the awesome mechanics!

The game can be played in browser but it's not really made for being played in a browser. So for that reason we ask windows user to download the game by pressing the button below for the best experience!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move around
Hold shift to sprint
Space to roll
Left click to shoot
1 and 2 to swap guns
R to reload
F to pickup items
E to extract by the door
T to put down mines and barbed wire
TAB to open inventory
Left click on ammo in inventory to drop ammo


The mummies:

We have the Original, Charger, Tank and Jumper

The Team:

We are four students with different skills set and together we formed the team "La Nerds".
Everything in the game is made by us except for the sound effects and music!

Assets:

Music: Dark Future Music by Daniel Gooding  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/dark-future-music-3777
Sound Effects: https://freesound.org/
